Package org.ldaptive.provider.jndi

Class Summary
AttributesFactory Provides convenience methods for creating jndi attributes and attribute objects.
JndiConnection JNDI provider implementation of ldap operations.
JndiConnection.JndiExtendedRequest Class for exposing extended request properties.
JndiConnection.JndiExtendedResponse Class for exposing extended response properties.
JndiConnectionFactory Creates connections using the JNDI InitialLdapContext class.
JndiControlHandler JNDI request control handler.
JndiProvider Exposes a connection factory for creating connections with JNDI.
JndiProviderConfig Contains configuration data for the JNDI provider.
JndiStartTLSConnection JNDI provider implementation of ldap operations using startTLS.
JndiStartTLSConnectionFactory Creates connections using the JNDI InitialLdapContext class with the startTLS extended operation.
JndiUtils Provides methods for converting between JNDI specific objects and ldaptive specific objects.
NamingExceptionUtils Utility class that provides a bridge between JNDI naming exceptions and ldap result codes.
